description:
It’s official, the Tournament of Power is announced. There’s just one problem: the losers of the tournament will have their universes erased! To introduce his future self to the joys of martial arts, Zeno calls for an exhibition match between the 7th and 9th Universe.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Götter aller Universen sind schockiert! – Wer beim Turnier der Kraft verliert, wird ausgelöscht!
Os deuses de todos os universos em choque ?! Perdedores apagados no Torneio do Poder
The Gods of Every Universe in Shock?! Losers Erased in the Tournament of Power
Zen Uchuu no Kamisama mo Donbiki!? Maketara Shoumetsu "Chikara no Taikai"
全宇宙の神様もドン引き!? 負けたら消滅「力の大会」
